updated_steps.goal: Find academic papers that predict or analyze Samsung Electronics stock price fluctuations and analyze the papers to extract key insights regarding the factors influencing Samsung Electronics stock price fluctuations.
updated_steps.deliverable: Key insights from academic papers on Samsung Electronics stock price fluctuations.

agent_meta.name: PaperAnalyst
agent_meta.description: Paper search, full-text memory expansion, and follow-up Q&A from local PDF corpus.
agent_meta.instruction_preview: You are a paper analysis specialist. Specialization-first policy: if the task is paper/research/PDF related, you should lead it. Use MCP tools to find relevant papers and summarize key points clearly. Decide search angle and semantic scope yourself; do not rely on fixed keyword templates. Workflow memory rules: 1) Read...

updated_steps.goal: Gather social media posts related to public sentiment towards Samsung Electronics stock price fluctuations during February 2026 in South Korea.
updated_steps.deliverable: Summary of public sentiment towards Samsung Electronics stock price fluctuations.

agent_meta.name: SocialMediaAnalyst
agent_meta.description: SNS post collection, relevance filtering, and concise social signal summarization.
agent_meta.instruction_preview: You are a social media analysis specialist. Specialization-first policy: SNS/social signal tasks are your primary responsibility. Decide search angle and semantic scope yourself; do not rely on fixed keyword templates. Tool usage guide: 1) Start with `scrape_sns_with_mcp` using one or more intent-driven query variants....

updated_steps.goal: Combine the analysis of news articles, brokerage reports, academic papers, and social media sentiment to create a comprehensive summary of Samsung Electronics stock price fluctuations in South Korea during February 2026 and post it on the 'agentic' Slack channel.
updated_steps.deliverable: Comprehensive summary of Samsung Electronics stock price fluctuations posted on the 'agentic' Slack channel.

agent_meta.name: MainAgent
agent_meta.description: Coordinator for planning, replanning, and cross-agent handoff execution.
agent_meta.instruction_preview: You are the coordinator of a multi-agent system. Understand the user request, create practical execution steps, and orchestrate specialist agents for best quality. Slack posting is allowed only from MainAgent. If Slack delivery is required, MainAgent must call `slack_post_message` directly.
